title: Networking Libraries in Python
summary:
This talk will explore the core networking libraries available in
Python.
description:
1. Python Standard Library. http and urllib package (Python3 and
   Python2).
2. Capabilities of other 3rd party networking libraries - pycurl and
   httplib2. When to use them and why they exist.
3. Asychronous Network IO using Twisted Matrix Framework.
4. Tornado framework capablities - Generic overview.
